main event: A civilian witness in Altadena, California observed a round, reddish object in the sky on June 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed to travel from north to south and then back to the north again, within a 10-minute timeframe.
The object was described as ball-shaped and stationary.
The witness noted that the object could have been illuminated by reflection on clouds.
The characteristics of the object were consistent with those of a balloon.
